widget.convert: { # Template for use when "description" is used # # For integrated extended help uncomment the "MultiContentEntryText" entries, # set the itemHeight for the extended entries to 50 and remove the panel for # "ScreenTemplateDescription4". "templates": { # Simple help with no headings ("flat") # data[1:] = [helpText] "default": (25, # itemHeight [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (20, 0), size = (790, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1) ]), # Simple help with headings # data[1:] = [heading, None] # For heading entries # data[1:] = [None, helpText] # For help entries "default+headings": (25, # itemHeight [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (810, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (20, 0), size = (790, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2) ]), # Extended help with no headings # data[1:] = [helpText, extendedHelpText] "extended": (25, # itemHeight [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (20, 0), size = (790, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1) # MultiContentEntryText(pos = (50, 25), size = (760, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2) ]), # Extended help with headings # data[1:] = [heading, None, None] # For heading entries # data[1:] = [None, helpText, extendedHelpText] # For help entries "extended+headings": (25, # itemHeight [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (810, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (20, 0), size = (790, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2) # MultiContentEntryText(pos = (50, 25), size = (760, 25), font = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3) ]), }, "fonts": [parseFont("HelpFont;20"), parseFont("HelpFont;20"), parseFont("HelpFont;20")], "itemHeight": 25 }

{ "template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (20, 0), size = (400, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2, color = "Text", color_sel = "TextSelected"), # Timer name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (440, 0), size = (360, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3, color = "InfoChannel", color_sel = "InfoChannelSelected"), # Service name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (20, 25), size = (400, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 0, color = "InfoProgramNow", color_sel = "InfoProgramSelected"), # Event name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (440, 25), size = (360, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 4, color = "InfoTimesNow", color_sel = "InfoTimesSelected") # Event time ], "fonts": [parseFont("Regular;20"), parseFont("Regular;18")], "itemHeight": 50 }
